resources.string:
Welcome to Budget Buddy!

 This app helps you track your daily expenses in a simple and efficient way.

 Main Screen:
 - The pie chart displays your expenses by category
 - Total expense amount is shown at the top
 - Use the Add Expense button to record new expenses
 - Use the View Expenses button to see and edit your expense history

 Add Expense:
 - Enter the amount spent
 - Select a category
 - Add an optional note
 - Press Save to record your expense

 View Expenses:
 - See all your recorded expenses in chronological order
 - Filter by date or category using the filters at the top
 - Tap on any expense to edit or delete it

 Settings:
 - Change the app theme (Light, Dark, or System Default)
 - Change your preferred currency symbol
